data.event: The Roman Empire conquered Raetia in 15 BC.

event.title: late 3rd century AD), the existing settlement of Curia Raetorum was made

data.event: Under emperor Diocletian (late 3rd century AD), the existing settlement of Curia Raetorum was made the capital of the newly established province of Raetia prima.

event.title: known bishop is one Asinio in 451 AD

data.event: Despite a legend assigning its foundation to an alleged Briton king, St. Lucius, the first known bishop is one Asinio in 451 AD.
In 1170 the bishop became a prince-bishop and kept total control over the road between Chur and Chiavenna.
